sentences.en: Giant waves lashed the sea wall.
sentences.cn: 巨浪拍打着海堤。

sentences.en: He received a lash of her hand on his cheek.
sentences.cn: 他突然被她打了一记耳光.

sentences.en: I decided to lash out and treat myself.
sentences.cn: 我决定多花些钱享受一下。

sentences.en: It's too easy to lash a crowd into anger with violent words.
sentences.cn: 很容易用激烈的言辞激起群众的愤怒.

sentences.en: Lash the piece of wood to the pole to make it longer.
sentences.cn: 把这块木头绑到那根竿子上使它更长些.

sentences.en: Lash the scenery up ready for the next act.
sentences.cn: 用绳子把布景固定住,准备演下一场.

sentences.en: Lash the two pieces of wood together to make them stronger.
sentences.cn: 把那两块木头牢系在一起使其更结实.

sentences.en: let's &B{lash out on} a taxi.
sentences.cn: 我们多花点儿钱乘出租车吧。

sentences.en: Never before had he felt the full lash of John's temper.
sentences.cn: 他以前从未见识过约翰如此暴烈的脾气.

sentences.en: Now a sharper lash of wind cut down and they huddled closer.
sentences.cn: 这时,刮起了一阵更刺骨的寒风,他们靠得更拢了.

sentences.en: Oliver lashed the horses to go faster.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗快马加鞭。

sentences.en: She went quiet for a moment while she summoned up the words to lash him.
sentences.cn: 她沉默片刻，寻思着抨击他的话语。

sentences.en: The coachman had a thin lash.
sentences.cn: 那马车夫有一根细长的鞭子.

sentences.en: The lion in the cage lash ed its tail.
sentences.cn: 槛中的狮子猛烈地摆动尾巴.

sentences.en: The rain was lash ing hard against the door.
sentences.cn: 雨猛烈地打着门.

sentences.en: The strong easterly wind lash ed at our faces.
sentences.cn: 强劲的东风猛烈地吹打我们的脸.

sentences.en: They were each given fifty lashes.
sentences.cn: 他们每人挨了50鞭。

sentences.en: This is no time to lash out on a new stereo.
sentences.cn: 现在不是奢侈花钱买新立体音响的时候.

sentences.en: We had to lash the cargo to the ship's deck during the storm.
sentences.cn: 在暴风雨中,我们不得不把货物紧系在船的甲板上.

sentences.en: With a lash of its tail the tiger leaped at her.
sentences.cn: 老虎把尾巴一甩朝她扑过来.
